text: The food is good and the drivers are nice, but the wait times seem long (often 55-75 minutes) and then the orders are almost always late on top of that.  So it's a bit annoying.  Tonight i finally complained to the driver.  I'm getting ‚Ä¶More

name: Success Romance
text: I ordered a pizza tonight, for delivery around 8:00pm I recieved my order late so I was given  it, for free. This shows you the manager really cares, for the customer. You Rock! I will be ordering again because I know these people take ‚Ä¶More

name: Vegan Moonchild
text: They get my weirdo order correct every time (veggie pizza, no cheese) and they are quick for pickup. I'll be shopping nearby, call my order in, and pick it up with no wait on the way home. Always nice people on the phone and in person.

name: christina james
text: Placed an order Online and it said 40mins, Okay no problem! I check the online tracking it says being boxed. I don‚Äôt live that far so I check again two mins later and it says canceled. No notification, no reason, nothing. I call the store ‚Ä¶More

name: Bill Tux
text: I usually get pizza delivered from this location using the Papa John's app. I've had some great experiences with the delivery drivers getting my food to me in a timely fashion and have yet to receive an inaccurate meal. I signed up to receive promotional coupons which has been a great incentive to order from here.

name: Allison Boyle
text: We order from here a lot, but lately it seems like our orders are never ready on time, and that the staff could really care less about that. It's too bad because this location is convenient, but there's plenty of other pizza places nearby we'll be going to instead now.

name: Pat Kelly
text: Food is always hot and tasty! I had tried Papa Johns a while back and I didn't like it, I ordered it again recently and was very pleasantly surprised!  The sauce is delicious it makes the whole pie!!   üòä

text: The pizzas were ready quickly. Good "Papa Johns" quality!

text: The pizza is delicious, their "large" needs to be bigger I feel like they don't make it "large" enough it looks the same like a medium. text: i loved the food and the courteous service, but the only thing i do not like about papa johns is that when the pizza is delivered to the customer, the pizza is cut poorly. you go to get a slice of pizza and it falls apart
